item.title: Hubspot's new, modern Asia Pacific headquarters in Singapore is designed with Millennials in mind
item.description:
Source: HubSpot. Pictured at the official opening ceremony, from left: Jeetu Mahtani and JD Sherman. HubSpot has officially launched its Singapore office and revealed plans to add 150 employees to its Singapore-based team over the next three years. Currently, HubSpot Singapore has 30 employees. The Singapore office, warmly referred to as SingSpot, joins the Sydney, Australia office as HubSpot’s second location in the Asia Pacific region and will serve as the company’s Asia Pacific headquarters...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hubspot-s-new-modern-asia-pacific-headquarters-in-singapore-is-designed-with-millennials-in-mind/

item.title: Hong Leong Group has decided to establish its global headquarters at Damansara City
item.description:
Source: Damansara City website. GuocoLand Malaysia’s key project, Damansara City, will soon house the Hong Leong Group’s global headquarters. The 33-story, top-tier office building, situated on the southwest side of this notable development, will be a major tenant within Damansara City when fully occupied by the second quarter of next year. The Hong Leong Group is a prominent Malaysian conglomerate with interests in banking, financial services, manufacturing, distribution, property development, investment, hospitality, leisure, and principal investment...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hong-leong-group-has-decided-to-establish-its-global-headquarters-at-damansara-city/

item.title: Increasing productivity and employee satisfaction at Garena Singapore
item.description:
The abundance of natural light, calming greenery, and plants creates an incredibly serene atmosphere. Situated on the 17th floor of One-North in Singapore, the office boasts breathtaking panoramic views. And then there’s the sheer size of the space… Garena Online, a Singapore-based Asian internet company offering services like digital content, e-commerce, and payments, has gone above and beyond to design a welcoming 7,500 square meter office. This effort aims to attract and retain top talent, essential for maintaining a leading position in the digital economy...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/increasing-productivity-and-employee-satisfaction-at-garena-singapore/
